data.text: @GovNL Great job criminalizing the unvaccinated people, you criminals in suits. Go read the Pfizer documents which was being released recently.

@GovNL My son got in close contact, and as per your stupid flow charts, he was to go to school and work, but stay home and isolate? He is now positive, luckily, we did not follow your stupid chart and kept him home from school. This new chart is just as bad, it contradicts basic logic?
